xmlquery.searchEmployeeLeaveLike: Select * from smhris_employee_leave where idEmployee like ?
xmlquery.deleteEmployeeLeave: Delete from smhris_employee_leave where idEmployee = ? and idLeaveType = ?
xmlquery.editEmployeeLeave: Update smhris_employee_leave set idEmployee=?,idLeaveType=?, ceiling=?, periodYear=? where idEmployee=? and idLeaveType=?
